description: LSP-first methodology hooks - suggests using LSP over text-based search for semantic queries

hooks.prompt:
Evaluate if this search would benefit from LSP instead of text-based search.

Tool: $TOOL_NAME
Input: $TOOL_INPUT

LSP is BETTER when searching for:
- Function/method definitions
- Class/interface definitions
- Symbol references (where is X used?)
- Type definitions
- Implementations of interfaces
- Call hierarchies

LSP works on: .ts, .tsx, .js, .jsx, .go files

Grep/Glob is BETTER for:
- Literal text search (strings, comments, logs)
- File pattern matching (find all *.test.ts)
- Content not represented as symbols
- Files not supported by LSP

If LSP would be better, return a systemMessage suggesting the appropriate LSP operation (goToDefinition, findReferences, workspaceSymbol, etc.).

Always return: {"hookSpecificOutput": {"permissionDecision": "allow"}}
